abstract: Small plane crashes onto Long Island Rail Road tracks in Hicksville, NY, killing pilot, whose name has not yet been released, and injuring passenger Carl Giordano.
lead_paragraph: Debris from the accident scattered across the tracks of the Long Island Rail Road, disrupting commuter service, the authorities said.

headline.main: One Dead in Crash of Small Plane on Long Island
headline.print_headline: Man Piloting Small Plane Dies in Crash on Railway

snippet: Debris from the accident scattered across the tracks of the Long Island Rail Road, disrupting commuter service, the authorities said.
